short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, no-login safe open-source notes app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CatNote is a simple & secure open-source Chrome extension designed for effortless note-taking. With its lightweight architecture, CatNote ensures a seamless and responsive user experience. Embracing simplicity, the extension offers a clutter-free interface, allowing users to focus on capturing ideas without any unnecessary complexities.

Powered by IndexedDB, CatNote securely stores your notes locally, providing a reliable and efficient solution for managing your digital thoughts. Say goodbye to login hassles – CatNote values your privacy and eliminates the need for user accounts, ensuring a hassle-free and anonymous note-taking experience.

Enjoy the flexibility of quick and easy note creation, enhanced by features like checkbox toggling, note prioritization, and a delightful cat-themed logo to add a touch of charm. The extension's commitment to minimalism ensures that your note-taking process remains streamlined and intuitive.

CatNote, with its commitment to simplicity, security, and user-centric design, caters to individuals seeking an uncomplicated and efficient note-taking solution. Open the door to creativity with CatNote – the extension that prioritizes your ideas, not unnecessary features.
